      Parameters:

      Returns:
      this WebsiteBuilder instance.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the path is not a directory.

    • walkDirectory

      public List<Path> walkDirectory​(String directoryPath) throws IOException
      Walks through the directory structure starting from the specified path. Extracts all subdirectories and files from the directory and its subdirectories.
      Parameters:
      directoryPath - the path to the directory to begin the walk from.
      Returns:
      a list of all files in the directory.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs when opening the directory.

    • mapUrlsToLocalPath

      public Collection<Path> mapUrlsToLocalPath​(Collection<URL> urls, Path basePath) throws IOException
      Takes a URLs and a base path, maps each URL to a local path. Removes the common URL prefix from each URL and uses the remaining URL with prepended basePath. Initially writing the transformed paths are written to a text file named "processed_paths.txt" for testing.
      Parameters:
      urls - A collection of URLs to be mapped.
      basePath - The base path for the local files.
      Returns:
      A collection of local file paths.
      Throws:
      IOException

    • findCommonPrefix

      public String findCommonPrefix​(Collection<URL> urls)
      Helper method to find the common prefix in a collection of URLs. Compares the path of each URL to find the longest common prefix.
      Parameters:
      urls - A collection of URLs
      Returns:
      The common prefix of the URL paths.

    • setBasePath

      public void setBasePath​(Path basePath)
      Sets the base path of the files.
      Parameters:
      basePath - the base directory as a Path object.

    • pruneNonHTMLFiles

      public List<Path> pruneNonHTMLFiles​(List<Path> files)
      Removes any non-HTML files from the list of files. Checks the extension of each file and removes it from the list if it is not html or htm.
      Parameters:
      files - List of file paths that need to be pruned.
      Returns:
      List of HTML file paths.

    • build

      public Website build()
      Builds a Website object with paths and list of urls.
      Returns:
      a new Website object
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the base path or URLs have not been set
